description: Cases of 'Brexit virus' are on the rise, a potentially deadly disease carried in sausages made with EU meat.
title: 'Brexit virus' caused by EU sausages causes 60,000 Britons to fall ill annually

author: Katie Forster
description: As Britain basks in its warmest weather since September, barbecue-goers have been warned to check their meat is properly cooked to avoid a mutant strain of hepatitis E found in one in ten sausages.
title: Warning over 'Brexit' vomiting virus found in 10% of sausages
